item.title: Databricks Declarative Pipelines via DAB
item.description:
This blog will provide an overview of how to use a DAB (Databricks Asset Bundle) template to provision a Declarative Pipeline.

Setup
#

A DAB project can be established from a template to ensure consistencies among related projects. DAB templates follow a Go package template syntax, as described in the DAB Template Tutorial docs.
